subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal beat the four-time champion Andy Roddick, 7-5, 6-4, on Saturday to reach the final at the Queen’s Club in London for the first time.
snippet: Rafael Nadal beat the four-time champion Andy Roddick, 7-5, 6-4, on Saturday to reach the final at the Queen’s Club in London for the first time.
